name: AsciiPresets
summary: Ready-to-use ASCII render presets tuned for console readability.

methods.name: Console
methods.summary: Creates a console-friendly preset that is much easier to scan from a terminal.

parameters.name: scale
parameters.summary: Scale multiplier applied to module size (try 3-5 for phones).

parameters.name: useAnsiColors
parameters.summary: Whether to emit ANSI color escape codes.

parameters.name: trueColor
parameters.summary: Whether to use ANSI truecolor (24-bit) output.

parameters.name: darkColor
parameters.summary: Optional ANSI color for dark modules.
